# 20 Golang API Projects (Pemula → Intermediate)

## (Generated by Claude AI)

## Tier 1: Basic (Pure net/http)

### 1. Hello World API
**Deskripsi:** API paling sederhana, return JSON "hello"
- Single endpoint GET `/`
- Return JSON
- **Skills:** Basic routing, JSON response

### 2. Echo API
**Deskripsi:** API yang echo kembali apa yang dikirim client
- Endpoint POST `/echo` - return request body as-is
- **Skills:** Parse JSON request body, return response

### 3. Calculator API
**Deskripsi:** API kalkulator sederhana
- Endpoint GET `/add?a=5&b=3` - return sum
- Endpoint GET `/multiply?a=5&b=3` - return product
- **Skills:** Query parameters, multiple endpoints

### 4. Todo List (In-Memory)
**Deskripsi:** Todo list sederhana tanpa database
- GET `/todos` - list semua
- POST `/todos` - add todo (store di slice/map)
- **Skills:** Multiple methods, in-memory storage

### 5. User Profile API
**Deskripsi:** API untuk manage user profile
- GET `/users/{id}` - get user
- POST `/users` - create user
- **Skills:** URL path parameters, struct marshaling

## Tier 2: Basic Framework (Gin)

### 6. Blog API (Gin)
**Deskripsi:** Simple blog dengan CRUD posts
- GET `/posts` - list posts
- POST `/posts` - create post
- GET `/posts/:id` - get single post
- PUT `/posts/:id` - update post
- DELETE `/posts/:id` - delete post
- **Skills:** Gin framework basics, CRUD operations

### 7. Weather API (External API Call)
**Deskripsi:** Proxy weather dari API eksternal
- GET `/weather?city=jakarta` - fetch dari OpenWeatherMap/similar
- **Skills:** HTTP client, external API integration, error handling

### 8. URL Shortener
**Deskripsi:** Shorten long URLs (in-memory)
- POST `/shorten` - create short URL
- GET `/:shortcode` - redirect to original
- **Skills:** URL encoding, redirects, unique ID generation

### 9. JWT Auth Basic
**Deskripsi:** API dengan JWT authentication
- POST `/login` - return JWT token
- GET `/protected` - protected endpoint (check token)
- **Skills:** JWT generation, middleware

### 10. Rate Limiter Middleware
**Deskripsi:** API dengan rate limiting
- Custom middleware untuk limit requests per IP
- GET `/api/data` - endpoint yang limited
- **Skills:** Middleware implementation, request counting

## Tier 3: Database Integration (SQLite)

### 11. User Management API (Database)
**Deskripsi:** User CRUD dengan SQLite
- CRUD users
- Store di SQLite (single file database)
- **Skills:** SQLite setup, GORM basics, queries

### 12. Product Store API
**Deskripsi:** E-commerce product management
- GET `/products` - list dengan pagination
- POST `/products` - create
- PUT `/products/:id` - update stock
- DELETE `/products/:id` - delete
- **Skills:** Pagination, database relationships, stock management

### 13. Notes API (Database)
**Deskripsi:** Note taking app backend
- User can create/read/update/delete notes
- Each note belongs to user
- **Skills:** Foreign keys, user authorization

### 14. Question & Answer API
**Deskripsi:** Q&A platform (Stack Overflow-like)
- Users ask questions
- Users answer questions
- Upvote/downvote answers
- **Skills:** Relationships (1-to-many, many-to-many), complex queries

### 15. Movie Review API
**Deskripsi:** Movie database with reviews
- Get movies, add reviews
- Average rating per movie
- **Skills:** Aggregation queries, JOIN queries

## Tier 4: Advanced Features

### 16. Multi-User Blog API
**Deskripsi:** Blog dengan user authentication
- User registration/login
- Each user has posts
- Only owner can edit/delete
- Public can view
- **Skills:** Authentication, authorization, user roles

### 17. Comment System API
**Deskripsi:** Blog posts with nested comments
- Posts → Comments → Replies
- Nested comment structure
- **Skills:** Recursive data structures, tree queries

### 18. File Upload API
**Deskripsi:** API untuk upload dan manage files
- POST `/upload` - upload file
- GET `/files/:id` - download file
- Store files di disk/cloud
- **Skills:** Multipart form, file handling, storage

### 19. Real-time Chat API (WebSocket)
**Deskripsi:** Chat API dengan WebSocket
- User connect to chat room
- Send/receive messages real-time
- **Skills:** WebSocket, goroutines, concurrent connections

### 20. Complete Social Media API
**Deskripsi:** Mini Twitter-like API (comprehensive)
- User registration/login/profile
- Create tweets/posts
- Like/retweet/comment
- Follow/unfollow users
- Feed (chronological posts from followed users)
- Search posts
- Pagination, sorting, filtering
- **Skills:** Complex relationships, authorization, performance optimization, caching considerations

---

## Learning Path Summary

| Tier | Project Range | Focus | Framework |
|------|---|---|---|
| 1 | 1-5 | Basics, routing, JSON | net/http |
| 2 | 6-10 | Gin framework, external APIs, auth | Gin |
| 3 | 11-15 | Database, CRUD, queries | Gin + GORM |
| 4 | 16-20 | Advanced features, complexity | Gin + GORM + extras |

## Tips
- Jangan lanjut project sebelum master yang sekarang
- Test setiap endpoint dengan Postman/curl
- Commit setiap project ke GitHub
- Refactor/improve project lama saat belajar yang baru
- Project 20 = portfolio piece yang impressive
